t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    maxi = a[0]
    steps = 0
    i = 0
    if a[0] == a[-1]:
        print(steps)
    else:
        while i < n - 1:
            i += 1
            steps += a[0] - (a[i] + steps)
        print(steps)

def result(n, a):
    mn = min(a)
    mx = max(a)
    return mx - mn
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    r = result(n, a)
    print(r)
